Don't pay attention to the bad reviews, some people are petty and don't realize this is a highly trafficked truck stop. I had no issues with shower pressure. But anyways to the meat of my review. ‚Ä¶

Store and pumps are busy. Like someone else mentioned, the design for pumps are pretty bad. Shower is pretty decent. Clean, spacious and have a decent water pressure. Subway was crowded like they were giving out free sandwiches.

My team driver and I stopped in for a shower we both paid $17. Both of our showers were dirty, I had trash on the floor and towels were stained. My partner couldn't shave because the fan wasn't working and he brought the stained wash cloth ‚Ä¶

They don‚Äôt clean showers on time, you have to wait for shower although if it‚Äôs vacant. Today I waited for one hour. Nobody cleaned showers for 1 hour. Never seen this kind of behaviour before at any Loves

Had to wait for a shower to be cleaned at 5:55 am with no one in line. Ham egg and cheese croissant had the texture of cardboard. I don't usually complain, but for these prices you expect better quality than normal truckstop garbage.

Oh my God I can't believe what just happened to me at this love's. I get a shower and after 5 minutes the love's employee doesn't knock but instead just opens my door while taking a shower. That is so.. disrespectful. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ to closing unlike a young lady named Tee Tee was the worst.  I would highly recommend retraining her on how to speak to customers as well as her attitude. But over all this Loves was staff was friendly and the shower was extremely clean.

I read the reviews and I went inside asked the clerk to see the showers before I pay for them. While I was waiting I ask a gentleman who had just took one. He gave them an 8 out of 10 due to his water wasn't as hot as he liked.  He said it ‚Ä¶
